features: 60 DEGREE ANGLED BROOM: 60°Strong bristles broom provides great convenience to pull out dust and dirt from the corners, gaps and grout lines. No dead ends would be left. This outdoor broom will help you create a neat and clean living environment.

4-LAYER HARD BRISTLES BROOM: DALIPER industrial broom is made of 4-layer bristles, which has enough force to sweep away heavy rubbish. The 14’’ wide broom can clean a larger area at a time. It’s super labor-saving.

55’’ LONG HANDLE: This floor broom comes with 4 sections metal pole, which can be adjusted from 22’’ to 55’’. It’s suitable for people of all heights, greatly reduce the stress from bending over to clean.

ERGONOMIC DESIGN: The EVA padded handle is soft to hold. When sweeping outside, no need to worry about heat or low temperature anymore. And you can hanging collapsible house broom on the wall after using.

VARIOUS APPLICATION: This long sweeping broom can be used both outdoor and indoor. You can not only use this extendable broom to clean patio, sidewalks, driveways, terrace, garden, yard, deck and porch, but also home, kitchen, garage, lobby and bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The broom was easy to assemble. The bristles are stiff enough to sweep wet leaves, which is a huge plus. Reasonable price. I'd recommend to family & friends

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together sweeps well!
reviews.reviewText: I haven't found a reason to dislike this broom. If it would sweep itself that would be a plus seriously a decent broom

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I'd buy this again.
reviews.reviewText: This broom was super easy to assemble. It's sturdy, works well. The bristles aren't too stiff. Light weight, we store it on the back porch. It's holding up well in all weather. Does everything we needed it for and does it well. It was a good price and I'd buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My wife Loves it. Seems it Flys faster than her old Broomstick. Now off to the dermatologist to get that wart removed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fine bristles make the difference
reviews.reviewText: This broom catches fine dirt particles and I really like the job it does. 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Flimsy. Staff bends. I can’t maintain all the dirt in the sweep. You’re constantly losing grip of what you’ve swept as you’re trying to sweep it to your pile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A study broom for indoors or out
reviews.reviewText: I was drawn to this broom because of the angled bristles, making it easy to use in corners. It was easy to assemble, with four pieces in the handle, with a cushion near the grip.With other brooms I've found the cushioning deteriorates over time and there is nothing special about this cushion to suggest otherwise. But the pieces of the handle all screw together tightly and where the lowest piece meets the broom itself, the connection appears firm. That is an area where nearly every broom I've had has literally fallen apart.I have already used the broom in several areas: my laminate floor kitchen, my concrete walkway and porch, and my wooden deck. It swept up debris efficiently without the need to go back and forth multiple times. And the angled broom did well getting into the corners. The bristles moved smoothly and I did not see any loose ones after sweeping.The broom came unassembled in its own box, with all parts included and none damaged or scratched. The only other item was a single sheet with a drawing of the steps for assembly. Putting it together is intuitive, and I wish the manufacturer had taken the time to add information on the company, such as customer contact numbers. However, it did not provide anything else.I do like the quality of this broom and hope it continues to perform well for at least a few years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use, comfortable handle broom
reviews.reviewText: Really happy with this broom. We had a big cemented backyard that gets a little messy with all the neighboring plants hanging over the fence. After raking up the bigger items, this really helped clean up the debris left behind. We also cleaned it then used it in the garage. It's nice to be able to take it apart as well as there really isn't a convenient spot to store it in the house and I'd rather not leave it outside.The cushioned handles makes using this for long periods of time less difficult.
